alert.note: Alert for Western Greenbrier (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Warning issued October 07 at 10:41AM EDT until October 08 at 10:00AM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM TO 10 AM EDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...Near-freezing temperatures as low as 32 expected. * WHERE...Western Greenbrier County. * WHEN...From 4 AM to 10 AM EDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Near freezing conditions will damage or kill sensitive vegetation. Unprotected outdoor plumbing could also freeze.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
